title: Leader of the shadow isles
body: If we created a leader for it we could also have events for it. Personally i'd like to call him/it Demon God Asura (thoughts and ideas plz)     http://img00.deviantart.net/079d/i/2009/342/a/1/kishin_by_corsmack.jpg

replies.body: Karthus is the king of the Shadow Isles

Mordekaiser is the ruler of the shadow isles
Tony abbott is the emporer of the shadow isles.
Tony Abbott is the eater of the Onion Isles
He's the eater in the onion aisle.

i actually thought no one was leader, there was a power struggle between Karthus and Elise
{{champion:60}}  elise all the way tho
